description.english: Complete the Prologue
description.french: Terminer le prologue

description.brazilian: Complete o prólogo
description.spanish: Completa el prólogo

description.english: Play through the game once
description.french: Terminer le jeu 1 fois
description.italian: Termina il gioco una volta.
description.brazilian: Finalize o jogo uma vez
description.spanish: Completa el juego una vez

description.english: Play through the game twice

displayName.italian: La calma è la virtù dei forti

description.english: Unlock the Black Knight, Thanatos
description.french: Débloquer le chevalier noir, Thanatos !
description.german: Schalte den Schwarzen Ritter Thanatos frei.
description.italian: Sblocca il Cavaliere nero, Thanatos!
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie o cavaleiro negro, Thanatos!
description.spanish: ¡Desbloquea al caballero negro Thanatos!

description.english: Unlock all skins for Metacles the Monk!
description.french: Débloquer toutes les apparences de Metacles le moine !
description.german: Schalte alle Skins für Metacles den Mönch frei.
description.italian: Sblocca tutte le skin per Metacles il monaco!
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as skins para Metacles, o monge!
description.spanish: ¡Desbloquea todos los aspectos de Metacles el monje!

description.english: Unlock all skins for Favian the Bard!
description.french: Débloquer toutes les apparences de Favian le barde !
description.german: Schalte alle Skins für Favian den Barden frei.
description.italian: Sblocca tutte le skin per Favian il bardo!
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as skins para Favian, o bardo!
description.spanish: ¡Desbloquea todos los aspectos de Favian el bardo!

description.english: Unlock all skins for Kedi the Tiger!
description.french: Débloquer toutes les apparences de Kedi la tigresse !
description.german: Schalte alle Skins für Kedi die Tigerin frei.
description.italian: Sblocca tutte le skin per Kedi la tigre!
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as skins para Kedi, a tigresa!
description.spanish: ¡Desbloquea todos los aspectos de Kedi la tigresa!

description.english: Unlock all skins for Khar the Dwarf!
description.french: Débloquer toutes les apparences de Khar le nain !
description.german: Schalte alle Skins für Khar den Zwerg frei.
description.italian: Sblocca tutte le skin per Khar il nano!
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as skins para Khar, o anão!
description.spanish: ¡Desbloquea todos los aspectos de Khar el enano!

displayName.italian: Te la do io la pensione

description.english: Unlock all skins for Crux the Warrior!
description.french: Débloquer toutes les apparences de Crux le guerrier !
description.german: Schalte alle Skins für Crux den Krieger frei.
description.italian: Sblocca tutte le skin per Crux il guerriero!
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as skins para Crux, o guerreiro!
description.spanish: ¡Desbloquea todos los aspectos de Cruz el guerrero!

description.english: Unlock all skins for the Wrestler, Florencio de la Torre, aka "El Antropólogo"!
description.french: Débloquer toutes les apparences du lutteur, Florencio de la Torre, alias "El Antropólogo" !
description.german: Schalte alle Skins für den Wrestler Florencio de la Torre frei, auch bekannt als "El Antropólogo"!
description.italian: Sblocca tutte le skin per il Wrestler, Florencio de la Torre, noto anche come "El Antropólogo"!
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as skins para o lutador, Florencio de la Torre, "El Antropólogo"!
description.spanish: ¡Desbloquea todos los aspectos del luchador Florencio de la Torre, alias "el Antropólogo"!

description.english: Unlock all skins for Zakwas the Bodyguard!
description.german: Schalte alle Skins für Zakwas den Scheich frei.
description.french: Débloquer toutes les apparences de Zakwas le cheikh !
description.italian: Sblocca tutte le skin per Zakwas lo sceicco!
description.spanish: ¡Desbloquea todos los aspectos de Zakwas el jeque!
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as skins para Zakwas, o sheik!

description.english: Unlock all skins for Roho the Robot!

description.italian: Sblocca tutte le skin per Roho il robot!
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as skins para Roho, o robô!
description.spanish: ¡Desbloquea todos los aspectos de Roho el robot!

description.english: Unlock the Magician, Edran

description.italian: Sblocca il mago, Edran
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie o mágico, Edran!
description.spanish: ¡Desbloquea al mago Edran!

description.english: Fulfill the Grand Soul Orb!

description.italian: Riempi il Grande Globo delle anime!
description.brazilian: Preencha o globo de almas grandioso!
description.spanish: ¡Llena el gran orbe de almas!
